description: Perona's personal quarters within Thriller Bark castle where she keeps her physical body while her ghost form fights elsewhere. The room reflects her gothic lolita aesthetic.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Discovers Perona's Physical Body
keyEvents.description: Usopp locates this room and finds Perona's unconscious physical body lying on her bed, confirming his deduction about her ability.
keyEvents.significance: The discovery of this location is crucial to Usopp's victory strategy.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Traps Perona with Torimochi Boshi
keyEvents.description: Usopp fires his adhesive Birdlime Star in this room, secretly sticking Perona's arm to the wall.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the trap that makes Perona's defeat possible.

keyEvents.title: Perona Defeated in Her Own Room
keyEvents.description: Perona is finally defeated in her own room through Usopp's psychological warfare tactics.
keyEvents.significance: The location of Perona's defeat, marking her removal from the Thriller Bark conflict.

significance: The location where one of the Mysterious Four is defeated, marking a turning point in the Thriller Bark arc.

description: The world's largest pirate ship, a massive island-ship that serves as Gecko Moria's base of operations. Contains a gothic castle and an entire zombie-infested forest.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Deduces Perona's Strategy
keyEvents.description: Usopp realizes that Perona's ghost form is fighting him while her physical body is hidden somewhere safe within Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's tactical analysis of the battlefield and enemy abilities.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Battles Doppelman
keyEvents.description: Concurrent battle scenes show Luffy struggling against Moria's shadow clone throughout the castle.
keyEvents.significance: Maintains the parallel narrative of multiple simultaneous battles occurring throughout Thriller Bark.

keyEvents.title: Robin and Chopper Fight General Zombies
keyEvents.description: Robin and Chopper continue their battle against zombie versions of their crewmates' fighting styles.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the scope of the conflict spanning throughout Thriller Bark.

geography.terrain: Island-sized ship with castle, forest, and cemetery

significance: The primary setting for the Thriller Bark arc where the Straw Hats fight to reclaim their stolen shadows.
